sentences.english: You are left eye, I am right eye, see together the world of mortals FuGuangLveYing.
sentences.chinese: 你是左眼睛，我是右眼睛，一起看紅塵浮光掠影。

sentences.english: From dependence to independence, To free from restraint, Like surface.
sentences.chinese: 從依賴到獨立，從束縛到自由，浮光掠影般。

sentences.english: Most persons do not see the sun. At least they have a very superficial seeing.
sentences.chinese: 多數人不見太陽，至少，只是浮光掠影。

definition: lit. flower viewing from horseback (idiom); a fleeting glance in passing/fig. superficial understanding from cursory observation/to make a quick judgment based on inadequate information
lit. the dragonfly touches the water lightly/superficial contact (idiom)
light and shadow/sunlight and shade
to pass in an instant/over in the twinkling of an eye
a white steed flits past a crack (idiom); How time flies!

illusion (Buddhism)/pipe dream
section/fragment/segment

a drop in the ocean (idiom)
fantasy/illusion/dream
